description: Application settings for the CI/CD domain

ci_job_live_trace_enabled.description: Enable cloud native architecture for storing job logs.

ci_partitions_size_limit.description: Maximum table size limit for a CI partition used for creating new partitions.

ci_partitions_in_seconds_limit.description: Time window, in seconds, before new partitions are created and the system switches to the next set of partitions.

ci_delete_pipelines_in_seconds_limit.description: Maximum value allowed for configuring pipeline retention.
